user.name: Mohammad Mahdi Kheirkhah
user.bio: AI & Quant Programming Enthusiast | Backend Developer | Grit:lab Student

node.name: bomberman-dom
node.description: This is a full-stack implementation of the classic Bomberman game. The game logic is handled on the backend using Go with structs, methods, and interfaces to follow object-oriented design principles. The frontend, built with JavaScript using our custom mini-framework, communicates live with the backend via WebSocket for real-time gameplay.

node.name: social-network
node.description: A familiar style social network that contains followers, user profiles, groups, events, notifications and chats. Exercise in the 01 edu curriculum.
